content: crocheting can be a fun and relaxing hobby and the waffle stitch is a great pattern to try out if you re looking for something new with its raised textured design the waffle stitch creates a cozy and warm fabric that s perfect for a baby blanket a scarf and more and the best part it s actually quite easy to learn in this crochet waffle stitch tutorial we ll go through the steps to get you started on a crochet adventure free pattern pdf and a video tutorial included the supplies you need… yarn choose a medium weight cotton yarn size 4 for best results as it s absorbent durable and easy to wash 1 x ball of the pima cotton yarn from we are knitters this yarn is 3 5 oz/100g/232 yds/212 m you can make two dishcloths with this amount of cotton yarn hook size a size h-8 5 mm crochet hook typically works well with medium weight yarn notions darning needle/yarn needle scissors tape measure finished size length = 8 inches/20 cm width = 8 inches/20 cm don t forget to follow handy little me on social media for more updates and to share your finished projects instagram @handylittleme facebook facebook com/handylittleme ravelry ravelry com/people/handylittleme pinterest pinterest co uk/handylittleme copyright the patterns and photographs of this design are the property of handy little me this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern collection or any items created using the directions in this pattern collection without consent please visit my terms of use page for additional information
